K12D0490_H0459:16b-28: rdo rje dregs ma lha mo che //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-29: rdo rje kumbhi yang dag bri //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-30: de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-31: thams cad las ni thon nas su //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-32: shar gyi cha ni thams cad du //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-33: sngags pa mnyam par bzhag pa yis //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-34: khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-35: de bzhin mi g-yo zhes bya dang //
K12D0490_H0459:16b-36: khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-1: bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-2: shar du bris nas sngags pa yis //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-3: de nas byang gi char song ste //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-4: rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-5: skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o; ;khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-6: khro bo blo ldan brtson 'grus che //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-7: pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-8: ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-9: 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to; ;de nas blo gros ldan pa yis //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-10: lho yi phyogs su song nas ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-11: der ni phyin te brtson chen po //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-12: khro bo chen po stobs po che //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-13: rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-14: shes rab chen pos dgod par bya //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-15: khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-16: de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-17: sgra gcan khro bo stobs po che //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-18: khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-20: de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-21: rkang pas bsnun pa'i rdo rje mchog /
K12D0490_H0459:17a-22: gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-23: bran dang pho nya khro bo ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-24: stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-25: de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-26: nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-27: der ni song ste brtson chen po //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-28: gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-29: gdong drug pa la lag drug pa //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-30: khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bgyi //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-31: khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-32: bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-33: dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du //
K12D0490_H0459:17a-34: khro bo gtum po thams cad bri //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-0: de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas @17b su; ;rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-1: dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-2: de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-3: rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-4: de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs lha //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-5: dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-6: dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-7: zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-8: gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-9: rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-10: de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-11: mtha' bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-13: tshangs pa mthun na 'don pa rnams //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-26: gya nom snang ba rnams dang /
K12D0490_H0459:17b-27: shin tu mthong ba rnams dang /
K12D0490_H0459:17b-29: dag pa'i gnas rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshams su dgod par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:17b-30: de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang /
K12D0490_H0459:17b-34: bden bral du bden bral dang /
K12D0490_H0459:17b-37: lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-0: phyi rol gyi shar phyogs su khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya @18a *//
K12D0490_H0459:18a-2: lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-3: nub tu khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-4: byang du rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-5: phyi rol tu ra ba dag gi nang du rgya mtsho chen po bdun dgod par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-6: de'i phyi rol tu 'gro ba lnga po gzhag par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-7: de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-8: sgo bzhi pa dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-9: gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan bsgreng ba /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-11: dra ba phyed pas sgrubs pa /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-12: de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18a-13: de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i
K12D0490_H0459:18a-14: tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas
K12D0490_H0459:18a-15: pa de'i steng du rdo rje seng+ge'i khri la bzhugs
K12D0490_H0459:18a-16: pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas
K12D0490_H0459:18a-17: nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis tshogs mchod la
K12D0490_H0459:18a-18: mnyes par byas te; mchod pa dang /
K12D0490_H0459:18a-22: bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas nam mkha'i gnas
K12D0490_H0459:18a-23: su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
K12D0490_H0459:18a-24: chen po rnam par bsams nas spyan drangs te bcug
K12D0490_H0459:18a-25: la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par bzhag ste
K12D0490_H0459:18a-26: / de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-0: rdo rje sems @18b dpa'i bdag nyid ni /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-1: rnam par snang mdzad nga'o snyam du snyems pa bsgom par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18b-2: de nas snying rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs
K12D0490_H0459:18b-3: bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa thams
K12D0490_H0459:18b-4: cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin de bzhin gshegs pa
K12D0490_H0459:18b-5: thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste
K12D0490_H0459:18b-6: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo
K12D0490_H0459:18b-7: rje sems dpa' h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi
K12D0490_H0459:18b-8: lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad h'um gi yi
K12D0490_H0459:18b-9: ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang
K12D0490_H0459:18b-10: bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te dam
K12D0490_H0459:18b-11: tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la cho ga bzhin du
K12D0490_H0459:18b-12: rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings
K12D0490_H0459:18b-13: la dam tshig la bzhag pa byas nas se gol
K12D0490_H0459:18b-15: kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang bcas /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:18b-17: de la de'i snying po bzhi po ni /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-19: aam aa: bdag byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas brjod la /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0490_H0459:18b-21: bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed do //
K12D0490_H0459:18b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags
K12D0490_H0459:18b-23: kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis sangs rgyas
K12D0490_H0459:18b-24: thams cad spyan drang par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:19a-4: sarba bo dhi satva pa ri bri t'a /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-5: pra tye ka ri ha ha te sv'ah'a /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-8: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra yo gi shva ra /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-11: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-12: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-13: dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-16: gzugs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:19a-17: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
K12D0490_H0459:19a-18: rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming
K12D0490_H0459:19a-19: brgya rtsa brgyad pa bton la cho ga ji lta
K12D0490_H0459:19a-20: ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs
K12D0490_H0459:19a-21: pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po
K12D0490_H0459:19a-22: rnams su rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las
K12D0490_H0459:19a-23: byas te / las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:19a-24: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-25: su ra ta badzra badzra satva dza: h'um bam ho: aa dhi tishthantu /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-26: sarba ta th'a ga ta mah'a manda lam/
K12D0490_H0459:19a-27: de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams
K12D0490_H0459:19a-28: kyis mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
K12D0490_H0459:19a-29: gsol ba gdab par bya ste /
K12D0490_H0459:19a-30: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lags kyi /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-0: de bzhin @19b gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-1: sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-2: bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-3: ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
K12D0490_H0459:19b-4: kyi mchod pa rab 'byams rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis
K12D0490_H0459:19b-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams
K12D0490_H0459:19b-6: cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyi brlab
K12D0490_H0459:19b-7: par bgyi'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12D0490_H0459:19b-8: de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi
K12D0490_H0459:19b-9: dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho
K12D0490_H0459:19b-11: de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de
K12D0490_H0459:19b-12: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag 'tshal
K12D0490_H0459:19b-13: ba'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab
K12D0490_H0459:19b-14: par bya ste / sa ma ya ho //
K12D0490_H0459:19b-16: sa ma ya badzra aa dhishtha nam ku ru m'am/
K12D0490_H0459:19b-17: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ye shu me
K12D0490_H0459:19b-18: ya dhi tishthantu sarba buddha m'am pra be sha yantu
K12D0490_H0459:19b-19: / pra ti p'a la yantu; p'u dz'anytsa me pra yantu /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-21: sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra mandal /
K12D0490_H0459:19b-22: aa lam k'a re ma h'a badzra manda le pra
K12D0490_H0459:19b-23: ti ba la yantu m'am stu dz'anytsa me pra yatstshantu
K12D0490_H0459:19b-24: / de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me
K12D0490_H0459:19b-25: tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang
K12D0490_H0459:19b-27: sor mo'i rtsa mor me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:20a-1: dzrum ba: ka: pram khim shrim dzrum ham mam/
K12D0490_H0459:20a-3: sarba ta th'a ga ta sa ma ya stva pra bi sh'a mi /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-4: de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g-yogs bcings la
K12D0490_H0459:20a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las
K12D0490_H0459:20a-6: 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i khams
K12D0490_H0459:20a-7: rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags
K12D0490_H0459:20a-9: sngags ni; sa ma yo ham/
K12D0490_H0459:20a-12: gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar sbyin par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:20a-13: de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:20a-17: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-21: bi kri ta bi dyu dzdzi hv'a dur d'anta da ma ka /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-22: ha si ta lambo da ra /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-32: badzra damshta kinytsi r'a ya si pra bi sha /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-33: badzra p'a ni hri da ya m'a bi sha m'a bi sha /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-36: ghurn'a pa ya ghurn'a pa ya /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-37: bhra ma ya bhra ma ya /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-38: p'a ta ya mo ta ya /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-43: sarba ta th'a ga ta dz'a ka ra pra ba ra /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-46: he he badzra dzham k'a ra h'um kri ta sv'ah'a /
K12D0490_H0459:20a-48: de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge ba'i ma mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes 'di'o //
K12D0490_H0459:20a-49: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-1: mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo //
K12D0490_H0459:20b-3: de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin
K12D0490_H0459:20b-4: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin du
K12D0490_H0459:20b-5: yongs su bzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang
K12D0490_H0459:20b-6: bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas
K12D0490_H0459:20b-7: la de'i dbus su kha dog thams cad kyis padma
K12D0490_H0459:20b-8: chen po 'dab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba'am
K12D0490_H0459:20b-9: / seng+ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-10: de nas de la dar gyi bgo ba dang /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-12: bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-24: glu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob
K12D0490_H0459:20b-26: dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs
K12D0490_H0459:20b-27: dang rjes su mthun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags
K12D0490_H0459:20b-28: 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ste; aom sarba ta
K12D0490_H0459:20b-29: th'a ga ta badzroshn'i sha aa bhi shinytsa aom badzra
K12D0490_H0459:20b-31: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-32: aom badzra padma aa bhi shinytsa /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-33: aom badzra badzra aa bhi shinytsa /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-39: rked pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la /
K12D0490_H0459:20b-40: rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-0: de nas rdo rje'i cho ga rnams brlab @21a *//
K12D0490_H0459:21a-2: de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-4: rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-5: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par 'joms par 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-6: ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la 'jug pa ste /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-7: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-9: h'um/ mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha'
K12D0490_H0459:21a-10: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur
K12D0490_H0459:21a-11: pa'i sems nges par rig par 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-13: aom/ 'dod chags kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang
K12D0490_H0459:21a-14: bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas 'dod chags pa dang
K12D0490_H0459:21a-17: zhe sdang gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas te /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-18: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-20: gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i mtha' ste /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-21: rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal bar byed par 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-23: ram/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-24: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa yid la 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12D0490_H0459:21a-25: sems can gyi rang bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21a-27: hr'im/ sems can thams cad sems gcig pa ste /
K12D0490_H0459:21b-0: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa @21b la 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12D0490_H0459:21b-1: sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21b-3: sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste /
K12D0490_H0459:21b-4: rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa'i don dang /
K12D0490_H0459:21b-5: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
K12D0490_H0459:21b-7: aom/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas
K12D0490_H0459:21b-8: 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su rtogs
K12D0490_H0459:21b-10: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro //
